advisory.name: RLBA-2022:5322
advisory.synopsis: mtools bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for mtools is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: Mtools is a collection of utilities for files created in the MS-DOS operating system. Mtools allow you to read, write, and move MS-DOS file system files (normally on MS-DOS floppy disks). Mtools supports Windows95 style long file names, IBM extended density format (OS/2 XDF) disks, and disks formatted in the 2M program. Install Mtools if your scenario requires using MS-DOS disks.
